author: Lili Lonergan
title: National: Intense meteor shower set to be visible over Irish skies tonight - Limerick Live
text: Intense meteor shower set to be visible over Irish skies tonight One of the most intense meteor showers is set to peak and be visible over Irish skies tonight. The Quadrantid Meteor Shower runs from December 28 until January 12 and can produce up to 120 shooting stars every hour. The peak is set to last up to six hours late tonight and early tomorrow morning and experts say it's best to get out into a wide open space with as little light pollution as possible to see its full effects. The Quadrantid meteor shower 2024 peaks tonight alongside a bright moon— SPACE.com (@SPACEdotcom) [https://t.co/AAFRAJxzlG] [pic.twitter.com/XDUC48qn4i] [January 3, 2024] Shooting stars, or meteoroids, are small, rocky particles that heat up and vaporize which then release energy and are visible as streaks of bright lights across the night sky. The Quadrantid meteor shower is thought to be caused by debris and dust left in the inner solar system by an asteroid that orbits the sun every five and a half years. Tonight's peak is set to coincide with the moon's last quarter phase which means the moonlight could interfere with the viewing of this celestial event but it is certainly not to be missed. Tomasz Rozpeda, aged 27, of no fixed abode was remanded in continuing custody | PICTURE: Brendan Gleeson Subscribe or register today to discover more from DonegalLive.ie Buy the e-paper of the Donegal Democrat, Donegal People's Press, Donegal Post and Inish Times here for instant access to Donegal's premier news titles. Keep up with the latest news from Donegal with our daily newsletter featuring the most important stories of the day delivered to your inbox every evening at 5pm.

author: Esporte News Mundo
title: Guga vê ótimo futuro para Brasil e exalta Fonseca: ‘Tendência de sucesso enorme’
text:
No lançamento de seu documentário gravado pela Disney+ nesta quinta-feira,
Gustavo Kuerten se mostrou otimista com o futuro do tênis brasileiro e fez grandes elogios para João Fonseca, jovem que recentemente completou 18 anos. Entre em nosso canal do Whatsapp – Entre em nosso BlueSky
Bia Haddad também foi citada como um dos pilares do crescimento do tênis nacional: “Vejo que estamos em um momento bem agradável do tênis com a Bia Haddad reluzindo e vindo um menino como o João Fonseca que é uma tendência de sucesso enorme, dos mais precoces existentes da história do tênis, nunca teve algo tão fantástico para criar perspectivas”, disse o catarinense tricampeão de Roland Garros que comentou sobre o processo de renovação de talentos do tênis nacional e futuros grandes jogadores como em sua época no final dos anos 90, começo dos anos 2000.
“Ao mesmo tempo nosso papel é tentar ser generoso para colher pois são poucos que temos. É difícil imaginar qual seria uma nova realidade, moldar pontos específicos, ter uma solução pronta pois requer muito trabalho, é um projeto difícil, pertinente a muitos esportes do Brasil. Sempre teremos e existe uma capacidade de crescimento. Vivemos um momento de melhor ilusão, mais palpável para quem sabe uma nova história dessa aí, uma empolgação nacional consiga dar uma girada. Quando se tem ciclos montados de uma próxima geração vindo três ou quatro jogadores, cria uma engrenagem suficiente. Tênis é complexo, é preciso investir bastante, na decisão leva pessoas a optarem por outros caminhos. Já foi muito mais afunilador. Cenário já é muito melhor do que convivemos, mas pelo nível de dificuldade, de gabarito, sempre estamos correndo atrás que algo que no mundo inteiro é acelerado por isso vejo que é uma tarefa árdua para tentar resolver”.
Guga foi questionado se o Brasil estaria melhor preparado para um novo número 1 do mundo no momento atual: “Brasil está mais preparado até mesmo porque já tivemos um episódios, as informações mais escancaradas e temos um trabalho bem melhor na CBT que já mapeou, tem indícios, agentes fazendo bons trabalhos, um catalisador pode dar uma velocidade de ruptura, construindo duas ou três gerações de sucesso, como a Espanha, na Itália onde passaram ao invés de 60, 80, passaram a ter 10 do mundo. Se vier uma referência, atletas tragam essa punjância. A Bia já é, no feminino vai aparecer na próxima, temos meninas novinhas, vão aparecer, jogando muito bem, encorajadas para ir ao circuito. Tendo essa frequência é mais natural. Ter a referência do surfe, além do vôlei para observar o que tem por aí e ser usado a favor do tênis”.
O documentário irá ao ar em cinco episódios a partir do dia 10 . Nos dois primeiros episódios há depoimentos de Márcio Carlsson, Fernando Meligeni,
Rafael Nadal , Marat Safin e Yevgeny Kafelnikov.

author: Rosemary Potter
title: "They Call This Eco-Conscious?": Mark Zuckerberg's $300 Million Superyacht Sparks Outrage as Climate Hypocrisy Reaches Absurd New High
text:
IN A NUTSHELL |
|
Mark Zuckerberg’s recent purchase of a $300 million superyacht, aptly named “Launchpad,” has made waves across the internet, but not for reasons one might expect. While the yacht’s design and opulence are undeniable, the focus has shifted to the ethical implications of such a purchase. This luxurious vessel has sparked a heated debate on social media, where critics label it as a “Climate Hypocrite’s Hideaway,” questioning how Zuckerberg, an advocate for environmental causes, reconciles this with owning a massive carbon-emitting yacht. The controversy offers a glimpse into the intricate balancing act between luxury and responsibility in the lives of today’s tech billionaires.
The Launchpad: A Floating Marvel or Environmental Concern?
At first glance, Mark Zuckerberg’s superyacht is a marvel of modern engineering and design. Spanning a remarkable 387 feet, the yacht’s sleek exterior, designed by Espen Øino International, is a testament to luxury and sophistication. It features a robust steel hull and an aluminum superstructure, providing an ideal blend of style and stability. The yacht is not just a floating mansion; it’s a statement. But what kind of statement is it making?
The yacht comes equipped with state-of-the-art amenities, including a helipad, and can reach speeds of up to 24 knots. Despite these impressive features, critics are quick to point out the environmental implications of such grandeur. The vessel’s carbon footprint is considerable, drawing parallels with other high-profile yachts owned by tech moguls like Jeff Bezos and Roman Abramovich. This juxtaposition of luxury and environmental advocacy has made Zuckerberg’s yacht a focal point in discussions about climate change and personal responsibility.
Public Reaction: Social Media and Climate Hypocrisy
The internet has not held back in expressing its views on Zuckerberg’s latest acquisition. Social media platforms are buzzing with discussions, memes, and critiques. Many users mock Zuckerberg’s dual stance as a climate advocate and a superyacht owner, highlighting the irony in his actions. A viral TikTok video showcasing the yacht’s stunning visuals has only fueled the controversy, sparking debates across multiple platforms.
Comments range from sarcastic jabs to genuine concern about the message this purchase sends. One user quipped about Zuckerberg’s yacht being a tool for planning climate strategies alongside other tech giants. Another pointed out the contradiction between owning such a vessel and advocating against the use of gasoline cars. This online backlash underscores the growing scrutiny that public figures face regarding their environmental footprint, especially those who publicly champion green initiatives.
[“Scientists Warn Everyone Makes This Deadly Heat Mistake”: Proven Ineffective Cooling Habit Spreads Every Summer, Endangering Lives Across America]
Environmental Impact: A Closer Look
While the yacht’s design is undeniably impressive, it is crucial to consider its environmental impact. Superyachts are notorious for their substantial carbon emissions, often surpassing that of small countries. Roman Abramovich’s fleet reportedly emits over 22,000 tons of carbon annually, while Jeff Bezos’ yacht contributes around 7,000 tons. Though specific figures for Zuckerberg’s yacht are not yet available, it is expected to follow a similar pattern.
This has led to a broader conversation about the role of wealth and luxury in exacerbating climate change. The discussion extends beyond Zuckerberg, touching on the responsibilities of all affluent individuals in mitigating their environmental impact. Can one truly advocate for sustainability while indulging in such extravagance? It is a question that continues to divide opinion, prompting many to re-evaluate the true cost of luxury.
[“We’ve Never Faced Heat Like This”: Meteorologists Warn of Historic Heatwave Set to Scorch the U.S. With Record-Breaking Temperatures]
The Broader Context: Tech Billionaires and Environmental Responsibility
Zuckerberg’s yacht is not an isolated incident but part of a larger trend among tech billionaires. Figures like Larry Ellison and the Google co-founders, Sergey Brin and Larry Page, also own superyachts, raising questions about their commitment to environmental causes. This trend highlights the tension between personal luxury and public responsibility, a theme that increasingly dominates discussions about wealth and ethics.
As tech leaders, these individuals have a significant influence on global trends and public opinion. Their actions set a precedent, making it imperative that they lead by example. The scrutiny faced by Zuckerberg reflects a growing demand for accountability among those who wield considerable power and influence. The conversation about his yacht serves as a reminder that with great wealth comes great responsibility, particularly in the context of climate change.
In the end, Mark Zuckerberg’s superyacht serves as a symbol of the complex interplay between wealth, luxury, and environmental responsibility. While the debate continues, it raises important questions about the future of sustainable living among the world’s elite. How will tech billionaires balance their personal indulgences with their public commitments to environmental causes? The world watches closely, eager for answers.
Did you like it? 4.3/5 (21)

author: @record_mexico
title: Bengals aprovecha a los suplentes de Cleveland y terminan la temporada con una victoria
text: Bengals aprovecha a los suplentes de Cleveland y terminan la temporada con una victoria [Jake Browning](https://www.record.com.mx/nfl-buccaneers/buccaneers-se-cuela-a-playoffs-con-tres-goles-de-campo-de-mclaughlin) lanzó tres pases de touchdown, [Joe Mixon](https://www.record.com.mx/nfl-bills-steelers/jaguars-se-despiden-de-los-playoffs-tras-perder-ante-tennessee) corrió para un máximo de temporada de 111 yardas y una anotación y los [Bengals de Cincinnati](https://www.record.com.mx/nfl-steelers/jj-watt-senala-que-tj-tiene-un-esguince-de-segundo-grado) consiguieron una fácil victoria 31-14 el domingo ante los Browns de Cleveland que le dieron descanso a casi todos sus titulares en preparación para los playoffs. Con la quinta posición de la Conferencia Americana asegurada, Cleveland (11-6) decidió terminar la campaña regular con suplentes antes de su primera aparición en postemporada desde 2020 y la segunda en los últimos 21 años. El quarterback Joe Flacco, el estelar defensivo Myles Garrett, el receptor Amari Cooper y el cornerback Denzel Ward estuvieron entre los titulares de los Browns que no jugaron. Los Bengals se fueron arriba 24-0 antes del medio tiempo. El quarterback de los Browns Jeff Driskel —quien firmó el 29 de diciembre del equipo de prácticas de Arizona— no tuvo una buena actuación ante los defensivos titulares de Cincinnati hasta el cuarto periodo cuando lanzó dos pases de anotación a David Bell. Los Bengals (9-8) tuvieron una complicada temporada. Su quarterback Joe Burrow no estuvo bien al inicio y sufrió una lesión que lo dejó fuera el resto de la campaña en la semana 10. Aun así Cincinnati terminó con marca ganadora por tercer año consecutivo y la División Norte de la AFC fue la primera división desde 1970 que tuvo a todos los equipos arriba del .500. [TAMBIÉN TE PUEDE INTERESAR: BUCCANEERS SE CUELA A PLAYOFFS CON TRES GOLES DE CAMPO DE MCLAUGHLIN](https://www.record.com.mx/nfl-buccaneers/buccaneers-se-cuela-a-playoffs-con-tres-goles-de-campo-de-mclaughlin)

author: Redacción
title: Rescatan a hombre en distribuidor vial de Toluca
text:
TOLUCA, Edomex.,14 de marzo de 2024.-Luego de varios minutos de diálogo, un hombre que subió a un distribuidor vial e intentaba lanzarse de la parte alta fue rescatado por los servicios de emergencia y policías en la colonia La Magdalena.
La persona del sexo masculino que vestía una camisa a cuadros, llegó caminando a la parte superior del cruce Alfredo del Mazo y López Portillo, luego amagó con caer al vacío al balancearse de la estructura de metal. Enseguida, automovilistas y testigos que se encontraban en el sitio alertaron a las autoridades, ambulancias del Servicio de Urgencias del Estado de México y de Protección Civil municipal acudieron al punto.
Los paramédicos y Seguridad Pública hablaron con el individuo, quien fumaba un cigarrillo, para tratar de disuadirlo a tomar la decisión, logrando en un momento jalarlo para ponerlo a salvo, después fue valorado en el sitio.
Por las labores, la circulación en dirección a la Central de Abastos tuvo que ser cerrada, lo que generó caos vehicular por más de una hora esta tarde de jueves.
